name: yarrow
content:
Add to word list

a plant with leaves like feathers and flat white flowers made up of many small flowers. It is used in traditional medicine: They grow nettle, yarrow, and chamomile, to make herbal teas. The river banks were thick with yarrow. Yarrows can be planted to combat soil erosion due to the plant's resistance to drought.
